author: ate
msg: RAVE-437: Check and cleanup of NOTICE files to only include 3rd party usages which require a (separate) notice.
- Fix the notice for Indiana University Extreme! Lab software usage (not XPP3 specific) as specified within their license file, which is also appended to the main LICENSE file.

author: ate
msg: RAVE-437: Check and cleanup of NOTICE files to only include 3rd party usages which require a (separate) notice.
- Remove separate notice for xstream, the require notice is already provided and present through inclusion of their BSD based license in the LICENSE file

author: dennisl
msg: - Add it to the l10n report as well

author: ate
msg: RAVE-437: Check and cleanup of NOTICE files to only include 3rd party usages which require a (separate) notice.
Remove notice for Opensocial Resources. The OpenSocial specification (since > 0.8) itself doesn't provide any code anymore, only a specification as such.
Furthermore, even the <= 0.8 specification provided only code under the AS 2.0 license but no additional notice is required, as none is provided by Open Social itself.

author: rmannibucau
msg: forcing an older dependency to avoid to need a snapshot repo
